unnormalised: Folks, always enable 2FA on your email and bank accounts! Seriously, it adds a crucial layer of security. Also, regularly update your OS; a recent patch fixed a vulnerability in Win 11 v22H2. Use a strong password – at least 12 chars with mixed case and symbols. And NEVER click on suspicious links in emails, especially if they ask for OTPs or personal info. Remember the WannaCry attack back in '17? Stay safe online!
normalised: Folks, always enable two factor authentication on your email and bank accounts! Seriously, it adds a crucial layer of security. Also, regularly update your O-S; a recent patch fixed a vulnerability in Win eleven version twenty two H two. Use a strong password – at least twelve characters with mixed case and symbols. And NEVER click on suspicious links in emails, especially if they ask for O-T-P-s or personal info. Remember the WannaCry attack back in two thousand and seventeen? Stay safe online!
